name: Forbidden Fight
description:
This is a game where you have control where you go. All pats are open to you at all times.  Your goal is to find gear hidden around the map so you can defeat a boss. However getting certain gear will help in some spots.

The elder of your people has warned you telling you a beast is coming  from the mountain in the forbidden lands you must stop it before its to late. You left in the night to avoid the law. But the elder wasn't as lucky. He was killed for encouraging you to go to the forbidden lands. It was morning when you got there and you could here the beast roar from where you were. Time is short don't let the elder's sacrifice be in vain.

Made with clickteam fusion 2,5
